description.text:
Apache Axis2 reports:

Apache Axis2 1.7.3 is a security release that contains a fix for CVE-2010-3981. That security vulnerability affects the admin console that is part of the Axis2 Web application and was originally reported for SAP BusinessObjects (which includes a version of Axis2). That report didnâ€™t mention Axis2 at all and the Axis2 project only recently became aware (thanks to Devesh Bhatt and Nishant Agarwala) that the issue affects Apache Axis2 as well.
